list.name: Changes
list.comment: add network image validation and fallback handling; update main.dart for platform-specific sqflite initialization; enhance report controller with date range report generation and download features; replace back buttons with circular back button widget; improve image loading error handling in recipe and ingredient screens; update UI for reports with date range toggle and excel download; include new utils and widgets for consistent styling and functionality.

task.summary: Default task

update theme colors for login and dashboard components; add new admin creation pages; extend network service with additional API methods; integrate new meal module; improve splash navigation logic; enhance UI consistency across platforms.
fix: update theme color references, add secure token storage, enhance splash animations, improve responsive layout, and refine login and dashboard components for better UX and security.
add new dashboard widgets for ingredient usage radar and recipe trend chart
fixes in settings
fix: improve login flow with internet connectivity check and enhance theme selection UI in settings
remove redundant quick stats row to streamline plan statistics display
add confirmation dialogs for bulk deletions and enhance ingredient management in meal and plan modules
add confirmation dialogs for bulk deletions and enhance ingredient and recipe management modules
refactor: enhance ingredient and recipe dialogs with vitamin/mineral selection and JSON validation, improve recipe dropdown UI, and update related controllers for better data handling
Dropdown issues

bug fixes1
bug fixes2
bug fixes3

refactor: optimize dropdowns with checkmarks and caching, enhance loading animations with shimmer effects, and improve performance in recipe and plan modules by caching filtered data and reducing rebuilds

refactor: enhance search utils with fuzzy matching caching and performance monitoring
refactor: improve search utils with fuzzy matching caching and performance monitoring
refactor: improve dialog sections with expandable content and add required field indicator; update dropdown hint style for better accessibility
update ui components and state variables for better default expansion and performance optimization
refactor: add refresh flags and loading states to dashboard, meal, and plan controllers for better refresh handling and UI responsiveness
refactor: add refresh flags and loading states to dashboard, meal, and plan controllers for better refresh handling and UI responsiveness
refactor: add refresh flags and loading states to controllers, update UI components for better responsiveness and consistency
